summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.description: Summoners use totems and summons to overwhelm enemies. (Summons, Damage)

ritualist.name: Ritualist
ritualist.description: Ritualists create miracles through hymns and dances, and can change state on the fly with masks. (Buffs, Versatility)

bloodmagik.name: Acolyte
bloodmagik.description: Acolytes use their own health to support others and deal damage. (Support, Damage)
bloodmagik.shortDescription: Sacrifice blood for power and heals

totem.name: Totem
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-RIGHT
Summon a Totem that damages
enemies around it every 0.4s.
 Mana Cost: 30
 Total Damage: 12% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 6%)
( Air: 6%)
 Duration: 30s
 Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

relikProficiency.name: Relik Proficiency I
description: Double your Main Attack's beam speed and
increase your damage when using a relik.
 Main Attack Damage: +5%

totemCost1.name: Cheaper Totem
description: Reduce the mana cost of Totem.
 Mana Cost: -10

totemicsmash.name: Totemic Smash
description: Your Totem will deal damage where it lands.
 Total Damage: 130% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 100%)
( Fire: 30%)
 Area of Effect: 3.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

relikSpread.name: Distant Grasp
description: Reduce your Main Attack's spread,
and increase its beam speed by +33%.
- Hand of the Shaman

haul.name: Haul
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-RIGHT
Leap towards your Totem.
 Mana Cost: 15

relikBeams.name: Hand of the Shaman
description: Your Main Attack will emit +2 extra beams.
(Increases your overall damage by +66%)

uproot.name: Uproot
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-LEFT
Emits a rapid projectile that will
explode and knock enemies away.
(Hold shift to pull instead)
 Mana Cost: 30
 Total Damage: 130% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 80%)
( Earth: 30%)
( Thunder: 20%)
 Range: 18 Blocks
 Area of Effect: 5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

haulCost1.name: Cheaper Haul
description: Reduce the mana cost of Haul.
 Mana Cost: -5

aura.name: Aura
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-LEFT
Radiates an aura from your Totem
 Mana Cost: 40
 Total Damage: 180% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 150%)
( Water: 30%)
 Range: 16 Blocks

shamanEarthPath.name: Earth Mastery
description:  Earth Damage: +2-4
 Earth Damage: +20%

shamanAirPath.name: Air Mastery
description:  Air Damage: +3-4
 Air Damage: +15%

shamanThunderPath.name: Thunder Mastery
description:  Thunder Damage: +1-8
 Thunder Damage: +10%

shamanFirePath.name: Fire Mastery
description:  Fire Damage: +3-5
 Fire Damage: +15%

naturejolt.name: Nature's Jolt
description: Hitting the ground after using Haul
will deal damage around you.
 Total Damage: 150% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 110%)
( Earth: 40%)
 Area of Effect: 4.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

shamanWaterPath.name: Water Mastery
description:  Water Damage: +2-4
 Water Damage: +15%

shockingAura.name: Shocking Aura
description: Aura will travel faster and
 Total Damage: +20% (of your DPS)
( Thunder: +20%)

flamingTongue.name: Flaming Tongue
description: Uproot becomes lashing flames,
which hit 3 times but will not
 Total Damage: -50% (of your DPS, for Uproot, per hit)
( Damage: -15%)
( Earth: -30%)
( Thunder: -15%)
( Fire: +10%)

overseer.name: Overseer
description: Increases Uproot and
Haunting Memory's range.
Hitting Totem with either
 Range: +6 Blocks

danceOfTheRain.name: Rain Dance
description: While mid-air, your Totem will
leave a streak of rain that damages
enemies under it every 0.4s.
 Total Damage: 60% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 30%)
( Water: 30%)
 Duration: 6s
 Area of Effect: 3.5 Blocks (Line-Shaped)

puppetMaster.name: Puppet Master
description: Your Totem will summon 1 Puppet
every 3s. (Max 3) They throw knives
at nearby enemies every 0.5s.
 Total Damage: 20% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 16%)
( Air: 2%)
( Earth: 2%)
 Duration: 30s
 Range: 16 Blocks
Min Summoner Archetype: 3

maskOfTheLunatic.name: Mask of the Lunatic
description: When casting Uproot, instead
wear the Mask of the Lunatic.
(Shift + Uproot to remove it)
While wearing this mask, the mana cost of
Aura is decreased and you gain damage bonus
at the cost of reduced resistance.
 Mana Cost: -30%
 Effects: +35% Damage Bonus to Self
-20% Resistance Bonus to Self
Min Ritualist Archetype: 2

bloodPool.name: Sacrificial Shrine
description: Your Totem will siphon 2% of your health
every 0.4s and transfer it into a Blood Pool ⚕.
Aura will spend 15 points of Blood Pool ⚕
to deal +35% damage and heal all allies.
 Total Heal: 25% (of your max health)
Min Acolyte Archetype: 3

stagnation.name: Stagnation
description: Enemies hit by Nature's Jolt
 Effect: 40% Slowness () to Enemies
 Duration: 3s
Required Ability: Nature's Jolt

auraCost1.name: Cheaper Aura
description: Reduce the mana cost of Aura.
 Mana Cost: -5

uprootCost1.name: Cheaper Uproot
description: Reduce the mana cost of Uproot.
 Mana Cost: -5

rebound.name: Rebound
description: Once Aura reaches its maximum
range, it will bounce back and
deal its effects a second time.
Sacrificial Shrine will
heal 40% less health.

morePuppets.name: More Puppets
description: Increase your maximum Puppets by +1.
Required Ability: Puppet Master

hauntingMemory.name: Haunting Memory
description: When you switch Masks, throw your previous one
forwards. If it hits an enemy, it will attach for a
short time and debuff them. You will not receive
the effects of your Mask until it returns.
 Total Damage: 240% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 240%)
 Range: 14 Blocks
 Effects: -15% Damage Bonus () to Enemies (from Lunatic)
-15% Resistance Bonus (✃) to Enemies (from Fanatic)
+30% Slowness () to Enemies (from Heretic)
 Duration: 4s
Min Ritualist Archetype: 4

totemRange.name: Better Totem
description: Increase your Totem's area of effect.
 Area of Effect: +4 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

bloodConnection.name: Blood Connection
description: If you are outside of your Totem's
range, Haul will teleport you to it.

hymnOfHate.name: Hymn of Hate
description: When wearing the Mask of the Lunatic, killing
an enemy with Aura will cast a new Aura
at its location, dealing -50% of its damage.
Required Ability: Mask of the Lunatic

explodingPuppet.name: Exploding Puppets
description: When your Puppets have 3s left,
they will charge towards enemies
at high speed and explode.
 Total Damage: 200% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 150%)
( Fire: 50%)
 Area of Effect: 3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Required Ability: Puppet Master

hymnOfHate.name: Hymn of Hate
description: When wearing the Mask of the Lunatic, killing
an enemy with Aura will cast a new Aura
at its location, dealing -50% of its damage.
Required Ability: Mask of the Lunatic

moreBloodPool.name: Larger Blood Pool
description: Increase your maximum Blood Pool ⚕ by +30 points.
Required Ability: Sacrificial Shrine

summonFocus.name: Bullwhip
description: Hitting enemies with Uproot or
Haunting Memory will inflict them
with Whipped ⇶. Your Summons will
focus Whipped ⇶ enemies and deal
 Effect: +20% Damage Bonus to Summons
 Duration: 10s

description: Increase your maximum Puppets by +2.
Required Ability: More Puppets

maskOfTheFanatic.name: Mask of the Fanatic
description: When casting Uproot, instead
wear the Mask of the Fanatic.
(Shift + Uproot to remove it)
While wearing this mask, the mana cost of
Totem is decreased and you gain resistance
at the cost of reduced walk speed.
 Mana Cost: -65%
 Effects: +35% Resistance to Self
-35% Walk Speed to Self

vengefulspirit.name: Vengeful Spirit
description: Your Totem will give all players
in its range a damage bonus.
 Effect: +20% Damage Bonus (⚔) to Allies

maskRotation.name: Masquerade
description: Switching between Masks 2 times
will give you 30 Mana.
Min Ritualist Archetype: 4

doubleTotem.name: Double Totem
description: Increase your maximum Totems by +1.
Totem and Aura will do 40% less damage.
Regeneration and Sacrificial Shrine
will heal 40% less health.

description: Enemies hit by Aura will be

regeneration.name: Regeneration
description: Every 0.4s, your Totem will heal
every player within its range.
 Total Heal: 1% (of your max health)

totemicShatter.name: Totemic Shatter
description: While wearing the Mask of the Fanatic,
your Totem will shatter upon impacting
the ground, rapidly triggering 8s
Regeneration will only heal

description: When switching to the Mask of the Lunatic,

auraDamage1.name: Stronger Totem

 Total Damage: +4% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +4%)

tether.name: Twisted Tether
description: When hitting an enemy with your
Main Attack, spend 1 point of
Blood Pool ⚕ to add Tethered ۞ to them.
Tethered ۞ enemies will take damage for
every 2% Health you lose. (Max 20%)
 Total Damage: 50% (of your DPS, per 2% health)
( Damage: 35%)
( Air: 15%)
 Range: 24 Blocks
 Duration: 5s
Min Acolyte Archetype: 7

totemicShatter.name: Totemic Shatter
description: While wearing the Mask of the Fanatic,
your Totem will shatter upon impacting
the ground, rapidly triggering 8s
Regeneration will only heal
50% of its usual amount.

description: Hitting your Totem with Uproot or

Effigy that will attack enemies
and push them towards your Totem.
 Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 75%)
( Water: 25%)
 Duration: 60s

 Area of Effect: 8 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

description: While wearing the Mask of the Heretic,

unless you are within its range.
Required Ability: Mask of the Heretic

description: When switching to the Mask of the Fanatic,
you and your allies are given a

 Duration: 2.5s
Min Summoner Archetype: 3

seekingTotem.name: Seeking Totem
description: While wearing the Mask of the Coward,
your Totem will move towards you,
unless you are within its range.
Required Ability: Mask of the Coward

hymnOfFreedom.name: Frog Dance
description: When wearing the Mask of the Heretic,
Haul will instead bounce you off
the ground 3 times at an increasing
speed and damage nearby enemies.
Frog Dance does not require Totem to be used.
 Total Damage: 200% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 150%)

shepherd.name: Shepherd

bloodLament.name: Blood Sorrow
description: Uproot or Haunting Memory will
spend 70 points of Blood Pool ⚕
to cast a destructive beam that
chains between enemies and allies,
and damages enemies every 0.2s.
You and any allies within the beam will
receive +2% Overhealth ❤ per hit.
Bonus health decays over 10s.
 Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 100%)
( Water: 20%)
 Duration: 4s
 Range: 24 Blocks
Min Acolyte Archetype: 12

uprootCost2.name: Cheaper Uproot
description: Reduce the mana cost of Uproot.
 Mana Cost: -5

maskOfTheAwakened.name: Awakened
description: After saving 150 mana from your Masks'
mana reductions, switching Masks will
cause you to become Awakened ♚
for 25s, giving you the upsides of all
Masks at once with no downsides.
Switching to an attached Mask
while Awakened ♚ will immediately
recall the Mask back to you.
Min Ritualist Archetype: 11
